item.title: highlight.js Test
item.description:
This is a test post to check whether the code snippet is highlighted with highlight.js or not. 

 function list_cols {
    awk -F, '{for (i = 1; i <= NF; i++) print i":", $i; exit}' $1
}
item.author: Haluk Dogan

item.title: MathJax Test
item.description:
This is a test post to check whether MathJax rendering works or not.

$$ \Large{\lambda f.(\lambda x.f (x\text{ }x)) (\lambda x.f (x\text{ }x))} $$ $$ \Large{P(A \vert B)=\frac { P(B \vert A)P(A) }{ P(B) }} $$
